Alicia Isaacson and I were thrilled to partner with PayPal for their annual Opportunity Hack this past weekend. The event featured 11 non-profits in need of IT solutions and almost 50 growing developers eager to support the cause. We were honored to present the MDI Horizon Award to our winning team. Congratulations to all the NPOs and teams that won!
MDI Group is dedicated to investing and empowering our local IT community. Reach out to me for any inquiries on how we can partner with your cause to help our community thrive!

MDI Group is a results-driven, professional services firm providing IT solutions that enable clients to achieve business objectives.MDI Group delivers flexible IT workforce solutions backed by subject matter expertise. Our IT workforce solutions enable Fortune 500 and mid-market clients to achieve critical business objectives. We ensure our clients’ IT project teams are directly aligned with business objectives, effectively staffed and successfully executed to drive business performance and results. As an IT certified business and a recognized thought leader in supplier diversity, MDI Group helps clients achieve a more inclusive workforce.MDI's services range from contract and contract-to-hire placements to project teams and end-to-end processes that maximize the engagement and management of contract labor.Take a look at our website at www.mdigroup.com for more information. I look forward to connecting with you. Currently Recruiting IT talent for Phoenix AZ, you can reach me at aisaacson@mdigroup.com or message me here.

MDI Group is a pioneer among IT staffing and recruiting agencies, providing a full range of recruitment services to help in-house resources tackle “what’s next" in terms of emerging technology projects and challenging business objectives since 1988. Services range from contract and contract-to-hire placements to project teams and end-to-end processes that maximize the engagement and management of contract labor. MDI Group has placed more than 10,000 technology consultants with mid-sized to Fortune 500 organizations across the country and has offices in Atlanta; Austin, Texas; Charlotte, N.C.; Dallas; Fort Worth, Texas; Greenville, S.C.; and Phoenix. For more information, visit www.mdigroup.com and follow @MDIGroup.
